inclusion.criterion: Men aged 60-85 catheterised for urinary retention and booked for outpatient removal of catheter
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Residual urine of more then 1 litre
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. He currently has a catheter in place due to severe urethral stricture.
